ComicInfo.Title: With Great Power...; The Mad Titan
ComicInfo.Summary:
Share the most important moments in Marvel history with young readers-two at a time!
First up: a science exhibit and a spider bite change Peter Parker's life forever when he becomes Spider-Man!
And if that weren't enough-find out what set Thanos on his path of conquest!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Lanna Souvanny | 1 | B | Cover B | Lanna Souvanny | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Agnes Garbowska (a) & Silvana Brys (c) | 3 |
